I would leave pds to be closed outside this method since it's being already closed at clean method.

  
    
      jbpm/jbpm-human-task/jbpm-human-task-core/src/test/java/org/jbpm/services/task/EmailDeadlinesDBTest.java

      in

           pds.close(); 
        
    
  


I would though move both st and conn variables closure to this finally block cause at the moment in case of any exception these won't be closed.
I've refactored to use try-with-resources for taking advantage of autocloseable and creating auxiliary methods for enhancing readability. Thanks for your review @afalhambra !
